section:
D:/gitworkspace/lua/liolib.c 文件参考 D:/gitworkspace/lua/liolib.c #include "lprefix.h" #include <ctype.h> #include <errno.h> #include <locale.h> #include <stdio.h> #include <stdlib.h> #include <string.h> #include "lua.h" #include "lauxlib.h" #include "lualib.h" liolib.c 的引用(Include)关系图:
此图展示该文件直接或间接的被哪些文件引用了:
结构体
struct RN
宏定义
#define liolib_c
#define LUA_LIB
#define L_MODEEXT "b"
#define l_checkmodep(m) ((m[0] == 'r' || m[0] == 'w') && m[1] == '\0')
#define l_popen(L, c, m)
#define l_pclose(L, file) ((void)L, (void)file, -1)
#define l_getc(f) getc(f)
#define l_lockfile(f) ((void)0)
#define l_unlockfile(f) ((void)0)
#define l_fseek(f, o, w) fseek(f,o,w)
#define l_ftell(f) ftell(f)
#define l_seeknum long
#define IO_PREFIX "_IO_"
#define IOPREF_LEN (sizeof(IO_PREFIX)/sizeof(char) - 1)
#define IO_INPUT (IO_PREFIX "input")
#define IO_OUTPUT (IO_PREFIX "output")
#define tolstream(L) ((LStream *)luaL_checkudata(L, 1, LUA_FILEHANDLE))
#define isclosed(p) ((p)->closef == NULL)
#define MAXARGLINE 250
#define L_MAXLENNUM 200
类型定义
